channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI aims to ship its first device in 2026, and it could be earbuds
item.description: The AI startup is on track to announce its first hardware device in the second half of this year, OpenAI Chief Global Affairs Officer Chris Lehane said during an interview Davos.

item.title: I test coffee makers for a living, and these are my top 3 recommended coffee pod machines – from Nespresso and more
item.description: Choosing coffee pods doesn't have to mean settling for sub-par espresso. Here are the three capsule machines I recommend for your kitchen.

item.title: North Korean hackers target Microsoft Virtual Studio Code
item.description: Contagious Interview keeps evolving, as Lazarus hacker now abuse Microsoft Visual Studio Code, too.

item.title: Attackers are getting stealthier – how can defenders stay ahead?
item.description: As attackers hide longer and deeper, behavior-first detection becomes the only reliable way to expose them.

item.title: « Coupez votre Bluetooth » : le Danemark alerte contre un risque d’espionnage américain
item.description: Les relations sont exécrables entre le Danemark et les États-Unis, depuis que Donald Trump insiste lourdement pour annexer le Groenland. C'est ce qui pousse les services de renseignement danois à recommander la désactivation du Bluetooth aux autorités : la technologie a des failles qui pourraient être exploitées par les États-Unis pour espionner les représentants du pays....

item.title: The First Look at ‘For All Mankind’ Season 5 Soars
item.description: Mars is just the beginning in the next season of the underrated Apple TV show, which starts March 27.

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets now on sale: Lowest rates all year
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets are officially on sale. Save up to $680 on your ticket and be among the first 500 registrants to score a +1 pass at 50% off. Don't miss 10,000 tech leaders, founders, and VCs in San Francisco from Oct 13-15. Register before these one-time deals vanish.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Thursday, January 22 (game #1459)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Thursday, January 22 (game #956)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Thursday, January 22 (game #690)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: My favorite open earbuds brand just released a new Clip model — but sadly, they're a let-down
item.description: The Huawei FreeClip 2 are let down by design and sound woes, with some feature issues too. It's a shame because there are some strengths.

item.title: Weber's 2026 smart grill lineup includes the company's first Wi-Fi-equipped charcoal grill
item.description: Weber has been in the smart grilling game since 2020, dabbling in Wi-Fi connectivity for gas and pellet grills. It has also offered grillers a standalone option for its Weber Connect platform. For 2026, the company is expanding its smart grilling lineup to its original fuel source: charcoal. Today, Weber announced the Performer Smart Charcoal Grill and Kettle Smart Ring, both of which bring Weber Connect control and cooking guidance to charcoal grilling in a more integrated way. The 22-inch Performer Smart Charcoal Grill has a Wi-Fi-enabled LCD controller that regulates grill temperature by ad...

item.title: Test des Huawei FreeClip 2 : taillés pour le sport, pas pour le salon
item.description: Deux ans après les FreeClip originaux, Huawei revient avec une version améliorée. Ces écouteurs ouverts promettent confort et légèreté pour les sportifs qui refusent l'isolation phonique. Il y a des amélioration ergonomiques, et le son est en progrès.

item.title: Casio G-Shock leak hints at stealthy, metal Garmin rival that fans have been begging for since 1983
item.description: A leak suggests Casio could soon launch a new G-Shock GM-H5600 smartwatch. with a metal design and an optical heart rate meter.

item.title: The Jackery HomePower 3000 portable power station is nearly half off at Amazon — save over $1,000
item.description: The Jackery HomePower 3000 with two 200W solar panels is on sale at Amazon for $1,598.99, down from the list price of $2,999. That's a 47% discount.

item.title: "Another wave of VPN blocks:" Windscribe records drop in traffic in Russia
item.description: Windscribe has recorded a sharp drop in traffic from Russia, signaling a new aggressive wave of internet censorship. Here's all we know.

item.title: I tested a bunch of Switch 2 screen protectors, and these are the best
item.description: A glass screen protector is one of a few essential accessories that I strongly recommend to every Switch 2 owner. In fact, it should be a priority to stick one onto the console’s screen as soon as possible to avoid accidental scratches. To test the candidates below, I installed and removed Switch 2 screen protectors […]

item.title: Save up to $600 on the five-star-rated OnePlus 15 with this mega trade-in deal at Best Buy — plus get a free $100 gift card
item.description: The OnePlus 15 is one of the best phones available right now, and it could be yours for as little as $399.99 when you trade in your old phone at Best Buy.

item.title: Alors qu’ils viennent à peine de sortir, les Xiaomi Redmi Buds 8 Lite perdent plus de 20 % à l’occasion des soldes d’hiver sur le site de Xiaomi
item.description: Les Xiaomi Redmi Buds 8 Lite sont des écouteurs sans fil vendus à 29,99 euros lors de leur sortie. Malgré ce prix déjà abordable, ils perdent encore 23 % sur le site de la marque. C'est donc l'occasion de se ruer sur ces écouteurs sans fil équipés de la réduction de bruit.

item.title: I tested the HP Pavilion 16 and it feels more premium than its price suggests – but don’t expect a powerhouse performer
item.description: The HP Pavilion 16 is impressively thin for a large laptop – but does it offer anything more besides?

item.title: Redmagic 11 Air officialisé : Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 et 7000 mAh pour moins de 500 €, le rapport puissance-prix actuel le plus agressif
item.description: Mettre un Snapdragon 8 Elite et une batterie de 7 000 mAh dans un smartphone à 499 euros ? Sur le papier, c'est pas mal du tout. Regardons où est le piège.

item.title: Ever thought 'I like my PDF editor but it needs more AI'? Adobe has you covered with a string of new updates launching for Acrobat
item.description: Adobe launches new AI tools for editing PDFs and generating content.

item.title: The 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is 33 percent off right now
item.description:
If you're looking to expand the storage on your Switch 2, the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now for 33 percent off, marked down to $80 from $120. With component prices skyrocketing these days, it's getting increasingly rare to see good storage on sale, and 512GB for $80 is a much better deal than you'll currently find directly from Nintendo.
The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games to the card that much faster. As for load times, in our testing we found that any microSD Express, the standard the Switch 2 requires, will offer roughly the sam...

item.title: « Une esthétique jeu vidéo » : le réalisateur de Pirates des Caraïbes tacle l’Unreal Engine, qui enlaidit les effets visuels à Hollywood
item.description: Le secteur des effets spéciaux et visuels est en crise depuis 15 ans. Entre budgets et aux attentes irréalistes des studios, les fameuses « CGI » des blockbusters sont bien souvent pires qu'il y a 20 ans. Selon le réalisateur de Pirates des Caraïbes, la faute est aussi à trouver du côté de l'Unreal Engine.

item.title: Samsung revives its Bixby assistant with an AI brain transplant from Perplexity
item.description: Samsung is relaunching AI assistant Bixby with Perplexity's real-time AI search.

item.title: Warren Buffett’s successor could be selling off millions of Berkshire Hathaway’s Kraft Heinz shares
item.description: Selling 325 million shares of the iconic brand would be Greg Abel’s first major move as CEO. Warren Buffett’s successor appears to be considering his first significant move after taking over as CEO this month.Kraft Heinz warned investors Tuesday that Berkshire Hathaway may be interested in selling its 325 million shares in the name brand food giant that Buffett helped create back in 2015. The news came in a filing with stock market regulators.Buffett and the Brazilian investment firm 3G Capital orchestrated the merger of Kraft and Heinz back then because they already owned Heinz and believed i...

item.title: 3 000 ventes en Europe sans aucun réseau officiel : l’étonnante performance des voitures électriques de Xiaomi
item.description: Si les voitures électriques de Xiaomi n'arriveront officiellement en Europe qu'en 2027, 3 000 d'entre elles sont pourtant arrivées sur nos routes en 2025 via un importateur privé. Reste que l'achat n'est pas sans contraintes.

item.title: Nova Launcher revient d’entre les morts, mais avec une mauvaise surprise
item.description: Nova Launcher fait son grand retour. Mais ce n’est pas forcément le cadeau que les fans attendaient. Le célèbre lanceur d'applications vient d’être racheté par une société suédoise, Instabridge, et la contrepartie est déjà visible : l’arrivée massive de publicités et de traqueurs.

item.title: Adobe Acrobat now lets you edit files using prompts, generate podcast summaries
item.description: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.

item.title: Polar Loop review: The screen-free fitness tracker is good on heart rate, but a software let-down
item.description: We tested the Polar Loop, the subscription-free Whoop alternative.

item.title: Instagram’s top boss is missing the point about AI on the platform
item.description: A couple of weeks ago, Adam Mosseri posted to his grid. In a series of messages, Instagram's top exec laid out his concerns for the platform in the coming year, largely around AI. The post was equal parts Working Through It, a sounding of alarms, and a rallying cry to creators who use the platform: […]

item.title: LastPass warns users of new phishing campaign sending out fake support messages
item.description: LastPass targeted with phishing campaign pressuring victims into sharing their master passwords.

item.title: Fini le PDF statique : Acrobat génère désormais vos présentations et podcasts
item.description: Adobe veut offrir une seconde jeunesse au format PDF et booster votre productivité. Grâce à l'IA, Acrobat ne se contente plus d'afficher vos documents : il les transforme en podcasts et en présentations visuelles.

item.title: Mike Colter Says Luke Cage Might Be Preparing for a MCU Return
item.description: Plus, 'Supergirl' finds itself another villain.

item.title: YouTube TV will launch custom multiview and channel packages ‘soon’
item.description: YouTube TV is getting ready to launch two major updates that will allow you to watch multiple non-sports channels simultaneously, as well as choose from 10 new paid plans focused on a range of topics, including sports, entertainment, and news. In his annual letter to users, YouTube CEO Neal Mohan says both of these changes […]

item.title: YouTubers will be able to make Shorts with their own AI likenesses
item.description: Your YouTube Shorts feed might soon be filled with a lot more AI-generated content from your favorite creators - including AI-generated versions of the creators themselves. In his annual letter released today, YouTube CEO Neal Mohan says that sometime this year, creators will be able to make Shorts using their "own likeness." Mohan didn't share […]

item.title: Adobe Acrobat uses AI to turn your PDFs into podcasts
item.description: Adobe has added new generative AI features to Acrobat that aim to help you quickly edit PDFs and summarize them in audio and visual formats. These updates include chat-based editing and the ability to generate personalized podcasts and presentations based on your docs, which are now available in Acrobat Studio - the AI-infused document workspace […]...

item.title: NYT Games’ Scrabble-like game Crossplay is a dream come true
item.description: This new Scrabble inspired game is a distraction-free alternative to ad-loaded competitors like Words With Friends.

item.title: PraxisPro raises $6M seed from AlleyCorp to coach medical sales reps
item.description: PraxisPro, founded by a former pharma sales rep, offers small language model AI training specifically designed for medical product sales.

item.title: Batman Begins proved once and for all that my LG C5 OLED has terrible sound, and I am over it
item.description: 4K TV sound is awful and I'm tired of TV manufacturers assuming it's OK because we'll buy a soundbar.

item.title: Adobe Acrobat can now generate presentations and audio podcasts from your documents
item.description: Back in August, Adobe debuted Acrobat Studio. The new service saw Adobe bring the humble PDF into the 21st century with support for a handful of new genAI features, including PDF Spaces, a hub where you can upload up to 100 documents and have AI summarize them. Now the company is enhancing the capabilities of those hubs with the introduction of four new genAI features inside of Adobe Acrobat, Acrobat Studio and Adobe Express. The next time you add documents and files to a PDF Space, you can prompt Adobe's built-in AI assistant to generate a presentation from those materials. The software will ...

item.title: LG OLED65B5 : ce TV 4K 120 Hz de 65 pouces devient enfin abordable grâce aux soldes
item.description: La gamme de TV OLED B5 de LG comporte des modèles très bien équipés, mais assez peu onéreux par rapport à la série C. Taillé pour le gaming, le LG OLED65B5 peut par exemple vous revenir à 999 euros au lieu de 1 499 euros chez PC Componentes.

item.title: La Chine dévoile un télescope spatial aux ambitions inédites depuis Hubble
item.description: Des études menées par des équipes scientifiques chinoises ont confirmé le potentiel du télescope spatial Xuntian, dont le lancement est prévu pour 2027. Avec ses instruments de pointe, Xuntian est attendu comme un catalyseur d'avancées en astronomie. Ces recherches promettent non seulement...

item.title: Trump’s arrival in Davos off to a bumpy start, as his quest for Greenland could take center stage
item.description: Trump arrived at the World Economic Forum after an issue aboard Air Force One required a return to Washington to switch aircraft. President Donald Trump arrived at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, on Wednesday, after a minor electrical issue aboard Air Force One had forced a return to Washington to switch aircraft.Shortly after he landed in Zurich, his Marine One helicopter took him to the site of the international gathering. The White House said arriving late wouldn’t push back his scheduled address at the forum in the Swiss Alps—where his ambitions to wrest control of Greenlan...

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écrans pour le télétravail et la bureautique en 2026 ?
item.description: Souvent négligé, un bon écran d'ordinateur est indispensable pour travailler confortablement. Nous avons choisi pour vous les meilleurs moniteurs pour une utilisation bureautique, notamment pour le télétravail.

item.title: Get NBA League Pass Premium for only $75 for the rest of the season
item.description: NBA League Pass, the streaming service that lets you catch hundreds of out-of-market NBA games, is on sale right now for up to 55 percent off. The League Pass Premium subscription is on sale for $75, down from $160, while League Pass Standard is marked down to $50 from $110. We're almost halfway through the season at this point, so it makes sense for a service like League Pass to start offering some discounts. The Standard plan includes commercials and support for only one device at a time, while the Premium tier offers no commercials, in-arena streams during breaks in the game, offline viewin...

item.title: Gold and silver prices are at a record high—can they keep up the surge? Look to Davos today for a clue
item.description: The precious metals could reach new milestones as safe haven assets rise, along with geopolitical uncertainty over Greenland and more Trump tariffs. In October, gold hit a significant milestone, reaching $4,000 an ounce for the first time. Less than four months later, the precious metal is well on its way to $4,900 an ounce in an astonishing push that shows no signs of stopping....

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : la 3e démarque démarre fort, voici les offres qui méritent votre argent
item.description: Cela fait déjà deux semaines que les soldes d'hiver ont commencé en France et que les e-commerçants tels qu'Amazon, Fnac, Darty, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount partagent des offres. Aujourd'hui, c'est la 3e démarque et les promotions se multiplient.

item.title: Xbox Game Pass adds Death Stranding DC, Ninja Gaiden, Talos Principle 2 and more
item.description: Microsoft has announced some solid additions to Game Pass this month, ranging from AAA titles to indies, including some of our favorites from 2024 and 2025. Topping the list is Death Stranding Director’s Cut, an extended version of Hideo Kojima’s 2019 sci-fi action game (now available). Other key inclusions are Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 (January 29) and puzzle game The Talos Principle 2 (January 27). We’re also seeing some award winners including Indika (February 2), a surreal tale about the devil living inside a nun’s head, one of Engadget’s 2024 games of the year. Last year’s Ninja ...

item.title: Connected data will rescue healthcare
item.description: The next leap in healthcare isn’t more information—it’s better intelligence.

item.title: Top online mentor site UStrive admits breach exposed data on children
item.description: Error in UStrive website allowed anyone to view sensitive user data, including names and email addresses.
